name: Nebula Mist
description:
A vertical space shooter! Currently have working the Survival Mode. Last as long as you can, get your highest score!

In Progress:

  • Wave Clear Implementation
  • Bosses
  • Beginning, Mid, and Finish storyline.
  • Multiple Ships to choose from
  • Drops and Pickups
  • More weapons!
